titles.title: From the ends of the earth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From the ends of the earth,
(From the ends of the earth,)
From the depth of the sea,
(From the depth of the sea,)
From the height of the heaven,
(From the height of the heaven,)
Your name be praised.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
From the hearts of the weak,
(From the hearts of the weak,)
From the shouts of the strong,
(From the shouts of the strong,)
From the lips of all people,
(From the lips of all people,)
Your song be raised.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Throughout the endless ages,
You will be crowed with praises,
Lord most high.
Exalted in every nation,
Sovereign of all creation,
Lord most high.
Be magnified.
